title: Trump allies worry billionaire Peter Thiel could be a no-show during the 2018 midterm campaign
text: × × Trump allies worry billionaire investor Peter Thiel could be a no-show during the 2018 midterm campaign 1 Hour Ago Trump allies are worried Thiel might not contribute to GOP candidates during the rest of the midterm race, according to sources who spoke to CNBC on the condition of anonymity. Several senior Trump advisors, including son-in-law Jared Kushner, according to sources, have been giving the cold shoulder to Thiel.
